::KitKat:;

She walked back to the base and went straight to her room.
She was confused and down hearted. She didn't know why, but she 
wanted the Preds to be a glorious group and win the war with the 
group intact.  She wondered why her other leaders never thoguht this 
way and wondered if something was wrong with her for thinking like 
this.
